properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.jdbc-url
properties.description: JDBC connection URL for the primary datasource.

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.username
properties.description: Login username of the primary datasource.

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.password
properties.description: Login password of the primary datasource.

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.driver-class-name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name for the primary datasource.

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.connection-init-sql
properties.description: SQL statement that will be executed when a connection is created.
